HitPay
Create an Account Login Have an account ?Login Login with Facebook Login with username / email Email Address Passcode Forgot Passcode? Not You? Input your HitPay registered email address to reset your passcode NEXT
Full Name (As per NRIC / Passport) Mobile Number 4 Digit Passcode
Email Verification Mobile Verification Step 1 of 2 Step 2 of 2 Enter your verification code below Resend verification code Resend OTP OR Re-Enter Email Address Re-Enter Mobile Number
HitPay POS allows you to collect business payments on the go, wherever your customers are Swipe to learn more
All Major Payment Methods Supported Sign up as a HitPay merchant and accept payments from business customers within minutes
No Recurring Fees. Only Pay Per Transaction Sign up as HitPay customer to send and request payments from your mates \n\nHitPay e-wallet works seemlessly with any Singapore Bank Account with PayNow and FAST bank transfers top ups
All Payments Processed using Best in Class Payment Security Standards We value customer data and do not share your data with any third party\n\nHitpay uses best in class payments and security architecture with support for PCI and DSS gateway and biometric authentication
Email Password Old Passcode New Passcode Login Sign Up
PAY DONE SHARE Request Limit : Top Up Balance SUBMIT REQUEST SEND INVITE Get free cash up to $100 when you refer friends to try HitPay HomeDrawerActivity

Account Settings Fingerprint Authentication Daily Transfer Limit Low Balance Alert Threshold Pending Payments Reminder CHANGE PASSCODE 4 Digit Passcode REDEEM
Complete bank transfer using below details Complete PayNow Transfer from your Internet Banking Platform to the below mobile number * Enter your Mobile number under transaction description * Use FAST Bank Transfers * Top Up Processing Time : Within 10 mins between 9AM to 9PM ADD HITPAY AS A PAYEE Add HitPay as a new payee in your bank\'s mobile / internet banking platform. Enter your Mobile Number under \'My Initials\' or \'Display Name\'
ADD ACCOUNT DETAILS Bank Account Name Account Number DBS +65 98644718 HitPay 0039366671 *PayNow Top Ups on HitPay require that your Bank Account First Name and Last Name matches your HitPay Account First Name and Last Name *PayNow Top Ups are supported for customers of Citibank, DBS/POSB, HSBC, MayBank, OCBC, Bank of China, ICBC and Standard Chartered. PayNow \nInstant Topup) FAST \nTopUp Within 10 Minutes
COMPLETE TRANSFER Transfer top up amount to HitPay Enter your Mobile number under transaction description TOP UP PROCESSING TIME \n Within 30 Mins Between 9AM - 9PM
TOP UP PROCESSING TIME DBS and FAST Bank Transfers Within 1 Working Day Other Bank Account Transfers 1-2 Working Days By signing up, I accept the terms and conditions
Tip :\n Clicking on the more button provides additional options Expected Payout Date Send Email Receipt
Track and Monitor Transactions Advanced Payments Notifications Lightning Fast Payments Industry Grade Security Send or request money to/from phone contacts or any mobile number

Transaction Successful Transaction Failed Create a new Stripe Account or link an existing Stripe Account to start accepting card payments on HitPay
Stripe Payouts displayed below.\nEdit/View bank account at https://dashboard.stripe.com Share/Copy the referral link with your contacts from the button below\n\n*The referred user must charge a minimum cumulative amount of SGD$100 on HitPay to qualify as successful referral.\n\nExample: If you successfully refer 20 users on HitPay, you pay SGD$0 payment fee for the next SGD$2000 you charge on HitPay

We have updated our platform to introduce a whole new set of business tools to power your business HitPay Terminal HitPay\nE-Commerce Payment Gateway\nHitPay Invoicing\nHitPay E-Commerce Platform\nHitPay Instagram Checkouts\nShopify \u0026 Xero Integrations\nand a whole lot more... NEXT Create A New HitPay Login This is mandatory and you will login to HitPay on mobile and desktop using the newly created credentials.\n\nYou will no longer login to HitPay using Stripe details and this has no impact on your old transaction data on HitPay.

CURRENCY CURRENT VERSION 100 $1.00 DEVICE TYPE Disconnect Discovery Discover Readers Empty Reader EVENT LOG Version %1$s available. The reader will become unresponsive until the update is complete. Estimated update time: %2$s. Install update The reader will temporarily become unresponsive. Do not leave this page, and keep the reader in range and powered on until the update is complete. NEARBY READERS No reader connected No update available Read card for recurring payment Reader READER CONNECTION %1$s %2$s Simulated The SDK comes with the ability to simulate behavior without using physical hardware. This makes it easy to quickly test your integration end-to-end, from connecting a reader to taking payments. Terminal Testing Update complete Check if a reader software update is available.
